languages.text: {n}{petname} не моргая смотрит в одну точку. Из приоткрытого клюва ворона струится едва различимый, заполняющий комнату {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}шепот{/d}. Как только вы приближаетесь, звуки затихают — птица резко поворачивает к вам голову.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} не моргая смотрит в одну точку. Из приоткрытого клюва ворона струится едва различимый, заполняющий комнату {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}шепот{/d}. Как только вы приближаетесь, звуки затихают — птица резко поворачивает к вам голову.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} не моргая смотрит в одну точку. Из приоткрытого клюва ворона струится едва различимый, заполняющий комнату {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}шепот{/d}. Как только вы приближаетесь, звуки затихают — птица резко поворачивает к вам голову.{/n}

{n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} starrt ins Nichts, ohne zu blinzeln. Ein kaum hörbares {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}Flüstern{/d} dringt aus dem halb geöffneten Schnabel des Raben und erfüllt den gesamten Raum. Sobald du dich näherst, verstummt das Geräusch, und der Vogel dreht dir abrupt den Kopf zu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} starrt ins Nichts, ohne zu blinzeln. Ein kaum hörbares {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}Flüstern{/d} dringt aus dem halb geöffneten Schnabel des Raben und erfüllt den gesamten Raum. Sobald du dich näherst, verstummt das Geräusch, und der Vogel dreht dir abrupt den Kopf zu.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} regarde au loin sans cligner des yeux. Un {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}murmure{/d} à peine audible s'échappe de son bec entrouvert et emplit toute la pièce. Dès que vous approchez, le bruit cesse et la corneille tourne brusquement la tête vers vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} regarde au loin sans cligner des yeux. Un {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}murmure{/d} à peine audible s'échappe de son bec entrouvert et emplit toute la pièce. Dès que vous approchez, le bruit cesse et la corneille tourne brusquement la tête vers vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}眼睛一眨不眨地盯着太空，半张的鸟喙里传来几乎无法辨别的{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}低语{/d}声，传遍了整个房间。你刚一出现，低语声就停止了，那只渡鸦猛地将头转向了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}眼睛一眨不眨地盯着太空，半张的鸟喙里传来几乎无法辨别的{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}低语{/d}声，传遍了整个房间。你刚一出现，低语声就停止了，那只渡鸦猛地将头转向了你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname} mira al vacío sin pestañear. Un {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}susurro{/d} apenas audible surge del pico medio abierto del cuervo, extendiéndose por toda la sala. En cuanto te acercas, los sonidos se acallan y el pájaro gira la cabeza bruscamente hacia ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} mira al vacío sin pestañear. Un {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}susurro{/d} apenas audible surge del pico medio abierto del cuervo, extendiéndose por toda la sala. En cuanto te acercas, los sonidos se acallan y el pájaro gira la cabeza bruscamente hacia ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}はまばたきせずに虚空を見つめていた。レイヴンの半開きのくちばしからは、判別しにくいかすかな{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}囁き{/d}が漏れ出し、部屋いっぱいに広がっていた。あなたが近寄った瞬間、その音は止み、鳥は素早く頭をこちらに向けた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname}はまばたきせずに虚空を見つめていた。レイヴンの半開きのくちばしからは、判別しにくいかすかな{d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}囁き{/d}が漏れ出し、部屋いっぱいに広がっていた。あなたが近寄った瞬間、その音は止み、鳥は素早く頭をこちらに向けた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{petname}, gözünü kırpmaksızın boşluğa dalıyor. Kuzgunun yarı aralık gagasından belli belirsiz bir {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}fısıltı{/d} yükselip tüm odayı dolduruyor. Sen yaklaştığın anda ses kesiliyor ve kuş, başını keskin bir hareketle sana çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{petname} stares off into space without blinking. A barely distinguishable {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}whisper{/d} comes from the raven's half-open beak, filling the entire room. As soon as you approach, the sounds stop, and the bird turns its head to you sharply.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{petname} gözünü kırpmaksızın boşluğa dalar. Kuzgunun yarı aralık gagasından belli belirsiz bir {d|Encyclopedia:CQ_RavenDemonDecision}fısıltı{/d} yükselir, tüm odayı doldurur. Sen yaklaştığın anda ses kesilir ve kuş, başını keskin bir hareketle sana çevirir.{/n}
